definition: to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost/same as 鞠躬盡瘁|鞠躬尽瘁[ju1 gong1 jin4 cui4]

sentences.english: He was sure, he said diplomatically, that the government would do all it could.
sentences.chinese: 梁先生曾婉轉表示，他確信政府已經盡力。

sentences.english: Despite all my efforts to persuade him, he wouldn't agree.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我盡力說服他，可他就是不同意。

sentences.english: Althogh I tried to pursuade him to stop smoking, he still could not make his mind.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我盡力勸他別抽菸了，他還是下不了決心。

sentences.english: Artists who try to keep his uniform degree of light and shade in painting.
sentences.chinese: 那位美術家盡力保持他繪畫中明暗度的均勻。

sentences.english: I'll try my best to rout out a good goalkeeper for our football team.
sentences.chinese: 我願盡力爲我們的足球隊物色一位優秀的守門員。

sentences.english: I had no idea in what terms one shouted at koalas, but I did my best.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道別人用什麼字眼來叫，不過，我盡力而爲啦。

sentences.english: This motivates them to give their all to their companies, whether they make money or not.
sentences.chinese: 這使得他們會不計盈虧的對公司竭心盡力。

sentences.english: We must try our best to reduce the damage to a minumum.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須盡力把損失減小到最低限度。

sentences.english: I hope Your Most Reverend will take the lead and we shall do our best to follow in this work.
sentences.chinese: 希望大主教能帶頭領導，我們將盡心盡力追隨。

sentences.english: I'll work hard, do my bit defensively and help the team.
sentences.chinese: 我工作努力，盡力的協防，幫助球隊。

sentences.english: We will do our best to expedite shipment to meet your requirements in time.
sentences.chinese: 我們將盡力早裝，及時滿足你方所需。

sentences.english: A month 300,000 targets I will make one effort to attain.
sentences.chinese: 一個月三十萬的目標我是會盡力去做到的。

sentences.english: I shall use my best endeavours to secure you the position.
sentences.chinese: 我將盡力爲你搞到這個職位。

sentences.english: He says he will try to breed more cattle and rebuild his life.
sentences.chinese: 他說他會盡力繁殖更多的牛和重建他的生活。

sentences.english: I consider he is a Very abundance nice guy, which rewhichley only tries to hunter people.
sentences.chinese: 他是個老好人，總是盡力幫助更多有請致電。

sentences.english: In a delicate exercise, charities are trying to present their agenda without usurping the mayor.
sentences.chinese: 慈善機構正在不篡奪市長權力的前提下，盡力想方案。

definition: to fight for/to strive for/to win over
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
